Condor::


When Condor heard why Empath, why she hated Hydras, he felt in 
silence and didn't said nothing.

In spite of he disliked Decepticons and Preds, he couldn't avoid feel 
mercy for Empath. He didn't like hurt for pleasure and her rage and 
pain made him feel mercy.

Maybe he might be more tolerant with her, while she was a maximal' 
ally...




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Empath::
> 
> "To put it in terms your primitive brain can understand," Empath 
> snarls, "He Murdered My Boyfriend!"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > 
> > Rodimus nods at Condor, and then asks Empath.
> > 
> > Rodimus Prime: Why do you hate Galvatron err... Hydras so much?
